## GridProColumn class

The Grid Pro Column element.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class GridProColumn extends GridProColumn_base 
```
**Extends:** GridProColumn\_base

## Remarks

Used insde the Grid Pro element, to specify the column definitions (ColDef) for a given column.
